results.name: Number of partitions of n into an even number of parts such that the set of even parts has only one element.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Cristina Ballantine and Mircea Merca, Combinatorial proofs of two theorems related to the number of even parts in all partitions of n into distinct parts, Ramanujan J., 54:1 (2021), 107-112.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 13 2021
